hero.header: If you haven't got Picoi yet, have some PIE first! After all, it's just a piece of cake!

about.title: Project Introduction
points: You've been mining Bitcoin for over 3 years and seem tired of the long wait and the journey of great vision. Let's have a piece of our own PIE.
PIE will make Pinetwork and MEME greater!
PIE always supports Pinetwork and always belongs to the people's cryptocurrency!
Born under the driving force of tens of millions of pioneers worldwide, PIE shows you the direction and leads you to greatness!

options.label: Step 1: Create Wallet
options.text: Download OKX Wallet or other crypto wallet for free from the app store or wallet website. For PC users, download the Google Chrome extension from okx.com.

options.label: Step 2: Get SOL
options.text: Store some SOL in the wallet to exchange for PIE. If you don't have any SOL, you can buy it directly on OKX, transfer it from another wallet, or buy it on another exchange and send it to your wallet.

options.label: Step 3: Use OKX Wallet
options.text: You can directly exchange SOL for PIE using the 'Exchange' button in the wallet. Reminder: Be aware of transaction fees and slippage as on-chain transaction fees fluctuate.

details.label: Total PIE Donation Pool
details.description: Users who donate will share 10 billion PIE.
details.deadline: From January 1, 2025, 3:14 AM to January 10, 2025, 3:14 AM

miner.title: NFT Mining
miner.subtitle: Note: Can be withdrawn after 10 days, if not withdrawn, mining continues.

data.label: 10 Billion unlocks on June 28, 2025 and cross-chain to Pichain
